scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build-development-image: npm run build && sudo docker build . --tag kevindps06/web-app:development
scripts.push-development-image: npm run build-development-image && sudo docker push kevindps06/web-app:development
scripts.build-preproduction-image: npm run build && sudo docker build . --tag kevindps06/web-app:preproduction
scripts.push-preproduction-image: npm run build-preproduction-image && sudo docker push kevindps06/web-app:preproduction
scripts.build-production-image: npm run build && sudo docker build . --tag kevindps06/web-app:production
scripts.push-production-image: npm run build-production-image && sudo docker push kevindps06/web-app:production
